snippet.title: RetroRealms - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Michael Myers and Ash Williams return in two separate arcade action games in one package. Watch the latest RetroRealms trailer to see bloody gameplay as you take on the role of these horror icons and slash and blast your way through foes. The first two games in the RetroRealms horror series--John Carpenter’s Halloween and Ash vs Evil Dead--are available now on PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
